item.title: 19. C++ Separate Interface from Implementation
item.description: Separate class interface from implantation. In the video I talk abut “definition” being separate from “Implementation”; however, what I mean to say is, “definition separate from interface.” [embed]https://youtu.be/hv0lv783KqQ[/embed]
